channel.title: Video guides?
channel.description:
I think that if someone like miss silabsoft or someone who can make a server perectily then they shoul download a program called camtasia studio or hypercam and record their screen as they setup a private server, this way it is more easy to understand and we know what to click on and type etc.
http://www.techsmith.com/download/camtasiatrial.asp (Camtasia)
http://www.freedownloadmanager.org/downloads/hypercam_software/ (Hypercam)
This would be really helpful for people like me and other learners.
-Mozz
